column8:
I recently graduated the "Java" course at Software Development Academy, and while my experience was mostly positive, there were a few aspects that could be improved.
The syllabus itself is well structured and comprehensive, covering a wide range of essential topics in software development. I appreciated the hands-on approach, with plenty of opportunities to practice and apply the concepts taught which led me to build quite a solid foundation in programming.
However, there were times when the trainers and project coordinator were not on the same page... There were instances of miscommunication regarding project requirements and deadlines which led to some frustration among students.
Overall, I recommend Software Development Academy for those looking to learn software development. Just be prepared to put in the hours and work and maintain open communication with your trainers when facing challenges or if you get stuck.

column8: I had a very bad experience with them. More than a year ago I wanted to do a tester course. After I contacted someone from them and told me about the course, I was delighted and even happy that the next day a group was already starting and I quickly signed the contract, so that the next day we could start. On the phone, the sales guy told me about their experience in organizing courses, the experience of the trainers (over 10 years of experience), the very high employment rate after completing the course...etc. Therefore, that evening I received the contract, signed it and paid the first installment. In the first module, the first trainer had 1 year or so of experience testing Oppo phones. With all due respect to the girl, but she didn't have enough experience for herself but to teach others. I thought it was an introductory module and they would recover after that, but I was wrong, all the trainers were pretty much the same, little experience, the same information... Therefore, I decided to withdraw, but I found out that there is a clause in the contract that does not allow you to withdraw and you have to pay the full course if you want to do that (I admit, it is also my fault that I did not read that clause in the contract, but I believe that when all the facilities of the course were presented, this clause was intentionally omitted).
column11: Am avut o experienta foarte urâta cu ei. Acum mai bine de un an am vrut sa fac un curs de tester. Dupa ce am luat legatura cu cineva de la ei si mi a povestit despre curs, am fost încântat si chiar bucuros ca a doua zi deja începea o grupa si pe repede înainte am semnat contractul, ca de a doua zi sa începem. La telefon tipul de la vânzări mi a povestit de experienta lor in organizarea de cursuri, de experienta formatorilor( peste 10 ani experienta), de rata foarte mare de angajare dupa finalizarea cursului….etc. Prin urmare in seara respectiva am primit contractul, am semnat si am platit prima rata. La primul modul, primul foarmator avea experienta de 1 an si ceva pe testare telefoane opo. Cu tot respectul pentru tipa, dar nu avea suficientă experienta pentru ea dar sa mai predea si altora. Am crezut ca este un modul introductiv si dupa își vor reveni, dar m am înșelat toti formatorii erau cam la fel, experienta putina, informații la fel… Prin urmare am hoatarat sa ma retrag, dar am aflat ca in contract este o clauza care nu ti permite sa te retragi si trebuie sa achiți cursul integral daca vrei sa faci asta (recunosc, este si vina mea ca nu am citit acea clauza din contract, dar consider ca atunci cand au fost prezentate toate facilitățile cursului acesta clauza a fost omisa intenționat).

I recently attended the Data Scientist course offered by SDA. The course was very well structured and organized, and the materials presented were very accessible and easy to follow.
However, some of the trainers were not well prepared, and one of them did not respect the schedule, which led to the course being delayed by a month. The materials and tests used are not made by the trainers, which sometimes led to a lack of coherence and cohesion in terms of the content presented.
Despite these issues, the content presented was very relevant and up-to-date, and the trainers who were well prepared did an excellent job in conveying their knowledge and experience.
Overall, I recommend this course to those who want to improve their Data Science skills and are willing to accept some issues with the organization and training of the trainers. However, I hope that SDA will address these issues and improve the learning experience for future students.
column11:

Cu toate acestea,  unii dintre traineri nu au fost bine pregătiți, iar unul dintre ei nu a respectat orarul, ceea ce a dus la decalarea cursului cu o lună. Materialele si testele folosite  nu sunt realizate de către traineri, ceea ce uneori a  dus la o lipsă de coerență și coeziune în ceea ce privește conținutul prezentat.
În ciuda acestor probleme, conținutul prezentat a fost foarte relevant și actualizat, iar trainerii care au fost bine pregătiți au făcut o treabă excelentă în a-și transmite cunoștințele și experiența.
În general, recomand acest curs celor care doresc să-și îmbunătățească abilitățile de Data Science și sunt dispuși să accepte anumite probleme de organizare și pregătire a trainerilor. Cu toate acestea, sper că SDA va aborda aceste probleme și va îmbunătăți experiența de învățare pentru viitorii studenți.

For me, the UX/UI Design course at SD Academy is the second course I took at the academy, in addition to the JavaScript course, and I can say that it completed my overall picture regarding the creation and implementation of web applications, starting from the idea to the actual implementation of an application with all its functionalities.
The course is well structured, in terms of information and the stages of development of a UX Design project, and I believe that in terms of the theoretical part, I received a lot of information that helped me better understand the needs of users and how we can meet them.
I had good guidance from the trainers, who shared useful information from their own experience, helping us to get an idea of ​​how a real project is carried out.
I also received very good and useful information on the HR side regarding applying for a job in this field, even if we are just starting out.
Last but not least, I appreciated the help I received from the project manager Andreea, who did her best to help us with what we needed at different times, throughout the course.
Thank you for the experience I had in completing the second course of SD Academy and I am sure that the two completed courses will leave a positive mark on a future career in the IT field.
column11:

Cursul este bine structurat, din punctul de vedere al informației și al etapelor de dezvoltare a unui proiect de UX Design și consider că în ceea ce privește partea teoretică am primit multă informație care m-a ajutat să înțeleg mai bine nevoile utulizatorilor și cum putem veni în  întâmpinarea acestora.
Am avut parte de o bună îndrumare din partea trainer-ilor, care ne-au împărtășit informații utile din experiența proprie, ajutându-ne să ne facem o imagine despre cum se derulează un proiect real.
Foarte bune și utile informații am primit și pe partea de HR în ceea ce privește aplicarea pentru un job în acest domeniu, chiar dacă suntem doar la început.
Nu în ultimul rând am apreciat ajutorul de care am beneficiat din partea managerului de proiect Andreea, care a făcut tot posibilul să ne ajute cu ceea ce am avut nevoie în diferite momente, pe întregul parcurs al cursului.
Mulțumesc pentru experiența avută în parcurgerea celui de-al doilea curs al SD Academy și sunt sigură că cele două cursuri absolvite își vor pune amprenta pozitiv pe o viitoare carieră în domeniul IT.

The fact that the course material was aligned with the standards of the International Software Testing Qualifications Board (ISTQB) gave me confidence in the quality and relevance of the information I gained.

The training team at SDA was exceptional. They had extensive industry experience and were able to provide practical examples and relevant case studies to help us understand the application of theory in the real world of software testing. Additionally, the classroom atmosphere was open and interactive, allowing us to ask questions and engage in discussions, which contributed to enriching our learning experience.
In conclusion, the Software Tester course at Software Developer Academy was a valuable educational experience. I acquired essential knowledge in the field of software testing and developed practical skills necessary in this profession. I confidently recommend this course to anyone looking to specialize in software testing and build a career in this field.

column8:
I recently graduated from the Javascript from scratch course at SDA. The course lasted approximately 7 months and during this time I accumulated the knowledge necessary for employment in the field.
During the course, I encountered several impediments in terms of the smooth running of the activity, both from an organizational point of view and from the point of view of the information provided. The course is divided into modules, each of which can have a different trainer, and this was the first impediment. Due to the change of trainers, it was difficult to adapt to each one's teaching style. Some of the trainers are very poorly prepared from a pedagogical point of view. Out of 7-8 trainers, approximately 3 were those from whom I can truly say that I learned, with the rest I try to cover as much of the gaps left by them as possible. The materials presented, as well as those on the learning platform offered by SDA, are, for the most part, outdated.
In the end, I can say that I would not recommend SDA further precisely because of these things. People who are looking for professional retraining try to manage their time as best as possible, and because of the shortcomings presented earlier, SDA is a waste of money. If the trainer is good from a technical and pedagogical point of view, everything is fine. If not, alas and bitter.
column11:
De curand am absolvit cursul Javascript from scratch din cadrul SDA. Cursul s-a intins pe durata a aproximativ 7 luni de zile si in tot acest timp am acumulat cunostintele necesare angajarii in domeniu.
Pe durata cursului, m-am lovit de mai multe impedimente in ceea ce priveste buna desfasurare a activitatii atat din punct de vedere organizatoric cat si din punct de vedere al informatiei oferite. Cursul este impartit pe module, la fiecare dintre ele putand avea un alt trainer, iar acest lucru a fost primul impediment. Din cauza schimbarii trainerilor a fost greu sa ne adaptam la modul de predare al fiecaruia. Unii dintre traineri sunt foarte prost pregatiti din punct de vedere pedagogic. Din 7-8 traineri, aproximativ 3 au fost cei de la care pot spune cu adevarat ca am invatat, la restul incercam sa acopar cat mai mult golurile lasate de ei. Materialele prezentate, cat si cele de pe platforma de invatare oferita de SDA, sunt, in mare parte, vetuste.
La final pot spune ca nu as recomanda SDA mai departe tocmai din cauza acestor lucruri. Oamenii care cauta reconversia profesionala incearca sa isi dozeze timpul cat mai bine, si din cauza neajunsurilor prezentate mai devreme, la SDA dai cu banul. Daca trainerul este unul bun din punct de vedere tehnic si pedagogic, totul este in regula. Daca nu, vai si amar.

column8: As a complete newbie I decided to take the JavaScript from scratch course. I consider myself lucky as ~90% of the course was taught by a very cool trainer, very skilled but also humble, which helped us unconditionally with patience and calmness. column8: I completed the Java FullStack Developer course at System Software Academy, starting from scratch, without any prior programming knowledge. Throughout the course, I learned a lot, and the teachers were always there to answer questions and guide us. However, it is essential to understand that the learning process does not only depend on the academy, but also on you, as it is important to practice in your free time to succeed. I chose the Job Guarantee package, and at the moment I am waiting to take the ANC exam, a necessary step for them to continue their efforts to find me a job. The courses are not limited to the technical part – I also learned how to build a professional CV, how to create a successful LinkedIn profile, and many other aspects that matter in my career. I am very satisfied with everything I have achieved so far and I definitely recommend SDAcademy to anyone who wants to learn programming. However, you have to be serious and dedicated, because the results largely depend on your effort.

Cursurile nu se limitează doar la partea tehnică – am învățat și cum să îmi construiesc un CV profesionist, cum să îmi creez un profil reușit pe LinkedIn și multe alte aspecte care contează în carieră. column8:
Hello,

I started the Software Tester course at SDA Academy in January, aware that, since it was a professional retraining, I was starting from scratch. I expected a large volume of new information, and reality did not contradict me. That is why I dedicated myself 100% to each course session. In parallel, I invested a lot of time in individual study – I deepened the theoretical part and constantly practiced working with different tools specific to the field.

I chose the Employment Guarantee package and I can say with all conviction that it was one of the best decisions I made. Both the financial investment, as well as the time and effort put in were fully rewarded: I managed to find a job in manual testing even before completing the course.

I have only words of praise for the trainers – very well prepared, always available to provide clear explanations, regardless of whether it was about the time dedicated to the course or questions that arose during the week. A big plus, both for them and for the management team, was the quick reaction they had when I was announced “on short notice” that I was going to have a technical interview for my current job. After I informed them, they immediately mobilized, and the next morning I had a mock interview with one of the trainers – something that helped me enormously.

In conclusion, I highly recommend SDA Academy to anyone who wants a career in IT. However, you must be aware that you will be working with a large volume of new information, and success also depends on individual work. With the help of the trainers, the resources provided and a proactive attitude, I am convinced that anyone can succeed in this field.
column11:
Salutare,

Am inceput cursul de Software Tester in cadrul SDA Academy in luna ianuarie, constient ca, fiind vorba despre o reconversie profesionala, pornesc de la zero. Ma asteptam la un volum mare de informatii noi, iar realitatea nu m-a contrazis. Tocmai de aceea, m-am dedicat 100% fiecarei sesiuni de curs. In paralel, am investit mult timp in studiul individual – am aprofundat partea teoretica si am exersat constant lucrul cu diferite tools specifice domeniului.

Am ales pachetul Employment Guaranteesi pot spune cu toata convingerea ca a fost una dintre cele mai bune decizii pe care le-am luat. Atat investitia financiara, cat si timpul si efortul depus au fost pe deplin rasplatite: am reusit sa imi gasesc un job in testare manuala chiar inainte de finalizarea cursului.

Despre traineri am doar cuvinte de lauda – foarte bine pregatiti, mereu disponibili sa ofere explicatii clare, indiferent ca era vorba de timpul dedicat cursului sau de intrebari aparute in timpul saptamanii. Un mare plus, atat pentru ei, cat si pentru echipa de management, a fost reactia rapida pe care au avut-o atunci cand am fost anuntat „din scurt” ca urmeaza sa am un interviu tehnic pentru actualul loc de munca. Dupa ce i-am informat, s-au mobilizat imediat, iar a doua zi dimineata am avut o simulare de interviu cu unul dintre traineri – lucru care m-a ajutat enorm.

In concluzie, recomand cu toata increderea SDA Academy oricui isi doreste o cariera in IT. Trebuie, insa, sa fiti constienti ca veti lucra cu un volum mare de informatii noi, iar succesul depinde si de munca individuala. Cu ajutorul trainerilor, al resurselor oferite si cu o atitudine proactiva, sunt convins ca oricine poate reusi in acest domeniu.

column8:
I took an AI and Machine Learning course at SDA and the experience was extremely disappointing. The offer stated 539 hours, but the diploma only lists 180 hours (those with a trainer), and the completely irrelevant title of “Programmer Assistant”.

When I raised the issue, SDA’s response was that, according to Romanian law, there is no “AI and Machine Learning” specialization in the labor code. However, then why do they use it in their offer and promotion to sell the courses? Moreover, we were told that we would receive an “internal document” certifying that we had completed 539 hours and that we were specialized in AI. However, that document is not official and has no value for employers.

The price of the course is very high for what is offered, and the lack of transparency clearly shows the lack of good faith towards the students. I do not recommend it!
column11:
Am urmat un curs de AI și Machine Learning la SDA și experiența a fost extrem de dezamăgitoare. În ofertă erau trecute 539 de ore, însă pe diplomă apar doar 180 de ore (cele cu trainer), și titulatura complet nerelevantă de „Ajutor programator”.

Când am ridicat problema, răspunsul SDA a fost că, potrivit legislației din România, nu există specializarea „AI și Machine Learning” în codul muncii. Totuși, atunci de ce o folosesc în ofertă și promovare pentru a vinde cursurile? Mai mult, ni s-a spus că vom primi un „document intern” care să ateste că am finalizat 539 de ore și că suntem specializați în AI. Însă acel document nu este oficial și nu are nicio valoare pentru angajatori.

Prețul cursului este foarte mare pentru ceea ce se oferă, iar lipsa de transparență arată clar lipsa de bună-credință față de cursanți. Nu recomand!
